languages.text:
Понижает выносливость -5 и ловкость -10 за каждый стак.
Стакается до 3 раз

traits.locale_text:
Понижает выносливость -5 и ловкость -10 за каждый стак.
Стакается до 3 раз

languages.text: For each stack of this effect, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} is reduced by −5 and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is reduced by −10.
languages.original_text: Каждый уровень эффекта уменьшает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g} на 5 и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} на 10.

traits.locale_text: For each stack of this effect, Toughness is reduced by −5 and Agility is reduced by −10.
For each stack of this effect, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} is reduced by −5 and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is reduced by −10.
For each stack of this effect, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} is reduced by −5 and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is reduced by −10.

languages.text: Bu etkinin her bir birikimi için {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} niteliği 5, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} niteliği ise 10 puan azalır.
languages.original_text: For each stack of this effect, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} is reduced by −5 and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is reduced by −10.

traits.locale_text: Bu etkinin her bir birikimi için Dayanıklılık niteliği 5, Çeviklik niteliği ise 10 puan azalır.
Bu etkinin her bir birikimi için {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} niteliği 5, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} niteliği ise 10 puan azalır.

languages.text: Por cada acumulación de este efecto, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} se reduce en −5 y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} se reduce en −10.
languages.original_text: For each stack of this effect, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} is reduced by −5 and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is reduced by −10.

traits.locale_text: Por cada acumulación de este efecto, la Resistencia se reduce en −5 y la Agilidad se reduce en −10.

languages.text: 每层效果使{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}降低5点，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}降低10点。
languages.original_text: For each stack of this effect, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} is reduced by −5 and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is reduced by −10.

traits.locale_text: 每层效果使坚韧降低5点，敏捷降低10点。

languages.text: Chaque cumul de cet effet réduit l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} est de −5 et l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de −10.
languages.original_text: For each stack of this effect, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} is reduced by −5 and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is reduced by −10.

traits.locale_text: Chaque cumul de cet effet réduit l'Endurance est de −5 et l'Agilité de −10.

languages.text: この効果のスタックにつき、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}が-5低下し、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}が-10低下する。
languages.original_text: For each stack of this effect, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} is reduced by −5 and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is reduced by −10.

traits.locale_text: この効果のスタックにつき、耐久力が-5低下し、敏捷性が-10低下する。
この効果のスタックにつき、耐久力が-5低下し、敏捷性が-10低下する。

languages.text: Für jeden Stapel dieses Effektes wird die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} um -5 und die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} um -10 reduziert.
languages.original_text: For each stack of this effect, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} is reduced by −5 and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is reduced by −10.

traits.locale_text: Für jeden Stapel dieses Effektes wird die Zähigkeit um -5 und die Beweglichkeit um -10 reduziert.

languages.text: Каждый уровень эффекта уменьшает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g} на 5 и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} на 10.
languages.original_text: For each stack of this effect, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} is reduced by −5 and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is reduced by −10.
